select * from T_SYS_MSG_SEND_RECORD
where FEEDBACK_TIME is null order by id asc
select * from T_SYS_MSG_SEND_RECORD where id in ( #foreach( $id in $ids ) $id, #end -1)

select * from T_SYS_MSG_SEND_RECORD where 1=1
